content: if you ve been looking for a small project to try tunisian crochet look no further this cute little hat-shaped ornament works up in practically no time at all with almost no shaping and only a few yards of yarn it s even small enough that you don t need to buy a special afghan hook to make it letting you test out a new technique without investing a lot of time or buying new equipment even if you never want to try it again you ll have something to show for your efforts you d better watch out though - i bet you ll be hooked
